content.objective: Data Analyst with hands-on experience in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools, specializing in statistical analysis, data cleaning, and business intelligence. Skilled in transforming complex datasets into actionable insights to support data-driven decision-making. Proficient in Excel, Tableau/Power BI, and database management, with a strong ability to communicate findings clearly to stakeholders. Experienced in extracting, analyzing, and interpreting data to optimize business performance. Collaborative team player with a keen eye for detail and a passion for continuous learning in data analytics and emerging technologies.

experience.role: Software Developer in Artificial Intelligence Training
responsibilities: Collaborated on the development and evaluation of generative AI models.
Created and reviewed data to improve model accuracy and contextual understanding.
Applied domain expertise in computer science and programming to refine AI behavior.
Designed and delivered robotics and computer science curricula.
Taught advanced programming and AI concepts to students like python, C++ and Linear Regression.
Fostered a hands-on learning environment with robotics kits and software tools.
Incressed Course bookings by 20 percent by applying new curriculum and teaching methods.

projects.title: Stock Price Prediction with Machine Learning
responsibilities: Built a machine learning model to predict future stock prices based on historical data.
Used regression and LSTM models to capture time-dependent market trends.
Engineered features such as rolling mean, volatility, and technical indicators.
Evaluated model accuracy using RMSE and cross-validation techniques.
Tools used: Python, Scikit-learn, Keras, Pandas, yFinance, Matplotlib.

projects.title: Company Revenue and Financial Report Analysis
responsibilities: Analyzed quarterly and annual financial reports of publicly traded companies.
Performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) using Python to detect long-term and short-term trends.
Used statistical analysis to detect patterns in profitability and cash flow movements.
Tools used: Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, Power BI, Excel.

projects.title: Student Performance Prediction Using Multiple Variables
House Price Prediction Using One Variable
responsibilities: Built a machine learning model to predict house prices based on a single variable.
Preprocess the dataset for training and testing the prediction model.
Using Python and libraries such as Pandas and NumPy for data analysis and model development.
Regression techniques are used to optimize the model for an accurate price prediction.
Tools used: Python, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib.
